note.p: Proof of "Shakspere-Bacon's Cipher," which was published first in 1887.

lg.head: SHAKESPERE–BACON'S CIPHER.
lg.l: I doubt it not——then more, far more;
In each old song bequeath'd—in every noble page or text,

In every object, mountain, tree, and star—in every birth and
life,

As part of each——finality of each—meaning, behind the os–
tentostent,
